title: Prime and maximal ideals in Hurwitz polynomial rings
abstract:
In this paper we study prime and maximal ideals in a Hurwitz polynomial ring
hR. It is well-known that to study many questions we may assume R is prime and
consider just R-disjoint ideals. We give a characterization for an R-disjoint
ideal to be prime. We study conditions under which there exists an R-disjoint
ideal which is a maximal ideal and when this is the case how to determine all
such maximal ideals. maximal ideal to be generated by polynomials of minimal
degree.
